rooms.description: Minimalist entrance with ample natural light from a West-facing opening. Vastu aligned orientation for positive energy flow.
Spacious living area utilizing large windows to enhance natural ventilation and sunlight, with minimalist decor and functional furniture layout.
Open concept kitchen integrated into the living space with efficient workflow design, incorporating energy-efficient appliances and abundant West-facing light for cooking activities.
Minimalist dining area adjoining the kitchen, designed to maximize natural ventilation and light, following Vastu principles of placement and spatial harmony.
Master bedroom with ample natural light from East or West orientation as per Vastu guidelines. Includes built-in storage and minimalistic design for a serene sleeping environment.
Private bathroom designed to complement the minimalist aesthetic, ensuring proper ventilation and functional layout while preserving privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance with sufficient natural light. West-oriented entry aligns with Vastu principles for prosperity and positive energy.
Large windows that allow abundant sunlight and cross ventilation throughout the day.
Provides access to an outdoor space that maximizes natural light and fresh air.
